lead_paragraph: Damian and Britt Zunino, the husband-and-wife partners of the New York design firm Studio DB, built a home for weekend getaways.
snippet: Damian and Britt Zunino, the husband-and-wife partners of the New York design firm Studio DB, built a home for weekend getaways.

headline.main: A Country House for a Family of Six
headline.print_headline: Three Stories for a Family of Six

abstract: New York-based designers Damian and Britt Zunino find designing for clients is easier than for their own weekend house in Amenia, NY; after several years and half dozen designs, couple agrees on roomy modern approach, enhanced by addition of traditional gable-roof outline off second-story structure.
